title: Computer-Supported Instructional Communication Strategy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and expertise in social sciences
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment utilizing bring-your-own-device (BYOD), with a practice-centered approach to strengthening social sector job competencies

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three effective classroom communication strategies in computer-based environments.
Learners can propose solutions to social issues through peer interaction on discussion platforms.
Learners can achieve over 80% self-directed learning outcomes using real-time feedback tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
